## 📤 Contribute to the Heat Tolerance Database

We welcome data submissions of plant heat tolerances from other scientists. If you'd like to share your data to this public data set, follow the instructions:

### Step 1: Download the CSV Template

Please use the template below to format your data correctly: [Download CSV Template](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1x9KkK7Rlx6qkzuW9bgFiQXjEZvzaViPG/view?usp=drive_link)

### Step 2: Submit Your Data

Once your CSV is ready, please upload it via [this secure Google Form link](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeO2FrMcVU3YP8t2_Fx0lt6BJ-Qx0gRl0D3lZaumzlpD9Tvmw/viewform?usp=header).

Submissions will be periodically reviewed and merged into the main database for all to access.
